shrimp.name: PtLineD
shrimp.description: Shortest distance between a point and a line segment
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: value
output.description: The minimum distance between P and the line segment Endpoint1 to Endpoint2

shrimp.usage: This function returns the minimum perpendicular distance between the point "P" and the line segment defined by "Endpoint1" and "Endpoint2".
